title: Broken.Sword.5 - The.Serpent's.Curse.Episode.2 Proper- RELOADED
description:
nERv 

Broken Sword 5 - the Serpent's Curse Episode 2 Proper (c) Revolution Software Ltd 

04/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Adventure 

NOTE 

The FLT release has been grp.req nuked because it does not allow
you to continue to Episode 2. Enjoy a working release 

This release is standalone and contains the episode 1 as well 

GAME INFO 

Paris in the spring. Shots ring out from a gallery. 

A robbery. a murder. and the beginning of another epic, original
Broken Sword adventure. 

From multi-award winning Revolution Software comes the latest explosive
episode in this classic series. Playing as intrepid American George
Stobbart and sassy French journalist Nico Collard, you find yourself on
the trail of a stolen painting . and a murderous conspiracy. A conspiracy
whose roots lie in mysteries older than the written word... 

Armed only with logic, integrity and a wry sense of humour - can George
and Nico save mankind from disaster? 

Can you solve the secret of the Serpent.s Curse? A curse forged by the
Devil himself... 

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
